name: Going Somewhere?
description:
14 levels of puzzle solving. Get where your going, with or without directions. Change your path. Get lost.

Press WASD to move, x to undo, and r to reset.

A full walkthrough of the game can be found here, though I do not recommend viewing it unless you feel very frustrated or are clearly stuck:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4knYEWvjPrk&feature=youtu.be
